jobDescription: We are looking for Data Analyst with AWS EMR, GLUE and Redshift experience as the primary skills along with ETL, Tableau and good SQL.  Position: Data Analyst  Location: Oakland, CA or Phoenix, AZ  Hiring Mode: Fulltime with Encore Software Services or Long-term contract  Start Date: Immediate Job Description: Exposure to ETL projects  Batch processing with tools like Talend  Exposure to tools like Tableau  Exposure to AWS Data Analytics toolset.  Good to have Java / J2EE knowlodge
